prompt: Design a dark-themed products list interface with a vertical scrollable layout. Each product card should have a circular icon placeholder at the top, centered product name in bold white typography, a concise description in light gray, and the price in bright orange. Place an 'Add to Cart' button with a green background and rounded corners below the price. Use a dark gray background for the scaffold and cards with subtle shadows for depth. Ensure 20px padding around the list and 10px between cards. The app bar should have a dark background with a white title and a slight elevation for contrast.
